nodes.bodyText:
Changes from primitive to class.
Primitive gives port a default value of zero.
This is a required parameter and its value should come from user input.
It's a required value so the value would never be the default though?

That's what my change fixed.
previously port was primitive, and that had a default value of 0 and consequently, the builder would never complain in cases when the user didn't supply the port as the port value would be zero by default.
